meanings: through the efforts[good offices] of Mr. Kim
(관용)for mercy´s[God´s, goodness´] sake,please for my sake
축하와 기원 I made it because of you.
축하와 기원 I owe it to you.

meanings.meaning: by dint of something/of doing something

vlive.korean: [이미 제 인생은 현승희 세 글자에 묻고 없습니다... 씅씅 덕분에 행복했다] 끝! [There's nothing more meaning in my life] You're done! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [2년 전 오늘의 OH MY GIRL] 울 씅씅에게 빠지면 치료법? 그런게 어딨어요 이미 게임오버💕 (HAPPY SEUNGHEE DAY 2years ago!)
vlive.english: [There's nothing more meaning in my life] You're done!

vlive.korean: [원스의 사랑 덕분에 디지털음원 본상이라는 큰 선물을 받은 트둥이들!] [With ONCE's love TWICE got the gift of Digital Song award!] View video TWICE : TWICE TV “34th Golden Disc Awards DAY 1”
vlive.english: [With ONCE's love TWICE got the gift of Digital Song award!]

vlive.korean: [물 흐르듯 자연스러운 몰아가기 정말 장꾸들 덕분에 잇몸 마른다니까] 이대휘 또... [So natural at ganging up, my gums dry because of AB6IX] DAEHWI, again... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [AB6IX] 우당탕식스의 (..버퍼링 중입니다..) 오째 생일파티🦀🎉 (HAPPY DAEHWI DAY!)

examples.korean: Sheer weight of numbers secured them the victory. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 순전히 수적 우위 덕분에 그들은 승리를 확보했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The tablets they gave him dulled the pain for a while. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들이 그에게 준 약 덕분에 통증이 한동안 누그러졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The tablets they gave him dulled the pain for a while. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The reptile’s prickly skin repels nearly all of its predators. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 파충류는 가시 많은 가죽 덕분에 거의 모든 포식자를 격퇴한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The reptile’s prickly skin repels nearly all of its predators. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This afternoon’s sunshine could nudge the temperature above freezing. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 오늘 오후에는 햇살 덕분에 기온이 영상으로 올라갈 수도 있을 것 같습니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
